title: Reevaluating pneumococcal vaccine guidance: An analysis

title_detail.value: Reevaluating pneumococcal vaccine guidance: An analysis

summary: If mitigating racial disparities in those who contract pneumococcal diseases, such as meningitis and pneumonia, is a top public health priority, then recommending that all adults get a pneumococcal vaccine at age 50 would likely be effective guidance.

summary_detail.value: If mitigating racial disparities in those who contract pneumococcal diseases, such as meningitis and pneumonia, is a top public health priority, then recommending that all adults get a pneumococcal vaccine at age 50 would likely be effective guidance.
